牆.definition: wall (CL:面[mian4],堵[du3]); (slang) to block (a website) (usu. in the passive: 被牆|被墙[bei4 qiang2])

牆倒眾人推.definition: lit. when a wall is about to collapse, everybody gives it a shove (idiom); fig. everybody hits a man who is down

牆面.definition: the surface of a wall (esp. an interior wall)

牆頭草.definition: sb who goes whichever way the wind blows; sb with no mind of their own; easily swayed person; opportunist
